Description: The One & Only Vanilla Flavored Chai is inspired by the sweet spice of aniseed, cinnamon and fennel, topped off with fine vanilla.

A new product, Chang Classic, was launched, with production shared between ThaiBev's three breweries. The recipe of Chang Classic includes rice, previously only used in the domestic 6.4% version of Chang Beer.

Anise is the liquorice-like flavour of the Pastis liqueur and aperitif typically consumed in the South of France, particularly Marseille, and associated with the game of petanque played in picturesque village squares.
4 oz Jars of Maple Sugar and Seasonings. Perfect for adding the great taste of maple to all of your culinary creations.

A 6 Pack of a GameDay Gumbo, one of Louisiana's signature dishes. Delicious dish made from roux and a mixture of seafood ( usually shrimp and crab) or poultry and sausage. Served over rice and great with French bread.
Boysenberries can get overlooked, but are a favourite in our house - especially at summer BBQs, mix some in with Dijon mustard and you've got a fantastic dip for your chicken skewers
The Sunny Fruit difference begins at the source - Izmir, Turkey. Here the perfect marriage of fertile soils and unique climate creates the most perfect dried fruits on earth.
Delicious Cranberry Chipotle Chutney made with Wisconsin grown cranberries, and spicy chipotle chilies, blended with zesty orange and lime juice and sweetened with sugar.
The Irish bovine live in a mild and humid environment, free to move into lush green pastures. As a result their muscles grow strong and the meat is tender and tasty.
Ikura (also known as salmon roe) are round, almost transparent salmon eggs, an unusual ingredient which is especially popular in Japan.
